SvcQC.Dep01.description: Can the service be deployed automatically (e.g. via IaC solution)?

evidence.success: The service is fully deployed using {lang_name} solution
evidence.failure: The service failed to be deployed using {lang_name} solution

SvcQC.Dep01.hint:
SQAaaS relies on a code repository that contains the recipes for the deployment of the computing services. As such, you need to provide the repo and (relative) path to the main configuration file.

The current set of deployment tools supported by the SQAaaS are: Infrastructure Manager (IM) and Elastic Cloud Computing Cluster (EC3)
